author: Sara Schaefer Munoz
title: In Nafta Shift, U.S. Focuses on Labor Standards
text:
The U.S. is pushing for higher labor standards in a new North American Free Trade Agreement as ministerial-level talks with Mexico and Canada get under way this week, in a shift that aims in part to gain congressional Democratsâ€™ support for a revamped deal.
Focusing on broadly higher labor standards in a new pact could also help resolve thorny differences between the nations over the content of autos manufactured in the trade bloc, according to officials and people familiar with the talks.
...
